productInfo.name: Impossible Glow
productInfo.generalDescription: Yes it’s possible to have ridiculously radiant skin without boarding a plane. And yes, it can be from an all-natural formula too. Our bronzing drops don’t just boost radiance, but hydrate and soften the skin too.
productInfo.description: We don't usually believe in quick fixes, but sometimes you want that golden, just-stepped-off-a-plane glow without dusting off your passport. So we're bringing it to you. A natural, healthy-looking glow, in a certified organic formula, that you can use all year round - and care for your skin while you’re at it.
productInfo.ingredients: AQUA (water), CITRUS LIMON FRUIT WATER* (lemon fruit water), MICA, GLYCERIN**, ASCOPHYLLUM NODOSUM EXTRACT (algae), HYDROLYZED GLYCOSAMINOGLYCANS, SCLEROTIUM GUM, SODIUM LEVULINATE, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, HYALURONIC ACID, SODIUM ANISATE, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM PHYTATE, MALTODEXTRIN, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)

content: Suited for all skin types and skin tones

COSMOS Organic, Vegan, Cruelty Free

information.title: How To Use
content: For subtle radiance add one drop to your daily moisturizer or SPF – whichever is your last layer of skincare. For a more intense bronzing effect, massage one to two drops directly into skin. Or gently dab across cheekbones as a highlighter, that hydrates too.
The Impossible Glow can also be used on the body either directly as highlighter or added to your body cream for a natural glow. Just allow to dry fully before dressing.
Shake before use.

information.title: Key Ingredients
content: Hyaluronic Acid -  A sugar the body naturally produces, HA can hold 10-50 times its weight in water. It then stores it like a reservoir for the skin to drink from all day long. You’ll find it in Pai products designed to hydrate skin.

Sea Kelp - This complexion-saving seaweed is an extremophile – meaning it can survive in extreme climates. Its ability to hold onto moisture in harsh, salty, high UV conditions is exactly what makes it so good at skin hydration. A sustainable crop, it grows at high speed and absorbs up to 20 times more carbon per acre than land forests.
Lemon Fruit Water - Extracted from lemons, this vitamin C-rich powerhouse brightens and moisturizes the skin to leave it glowing and radiant.

Mica - This glow-giving natural pearlescent pigment – alongside natural Titanium Dioxide & Iron Oxides particles – reflects light. It’s the size and shape of these particles that change the colour and intensity of our bronzing drops.

information.title: How To Use
content: Start by brushing brows upward with dry spoolie, following natural hair direction. Use your pencil as a guide for where brows should begin and end. Tilt pencil diagonally from the same starting point to the outer corner of your eye and follow the line to your temple–this is where brows should end. Apply gentle, baby strokes to fill where needed, the lighter the touch the better!

information.title: Key ingredients
content: Jojoba Oil: A wax ester that is similar in texture to the sebum that we produce naturally; 25-30% of human sebum is wax esters. Jojoba Oil moisturizes the skin through unique dual action: on the one hand, it mixes with sebum and forms a thin, non-greasy, semi-occlusive layer; on the other hand, it absorbs into the skin through pores and hair follicles, and then diffuses into the intercellular spaces of the outer layer of the skin to make it soft and supple.
Aloe Leaf Juice: A nutrient-rich juice from the succulent heart of the Aloe Leaf that helps deeply hydrate, whilst calming and soothing the skin.

Omega-Rich Oils (3, 6 & 9), including Avocado Oil, Shea Butter & Olive Oil: Topical application of omega fatty acids helps to: strengthen and smooth the skin’s surface; repair the skin barrier to improve moisture and elasticity; soothe irritated, sensitive and red skin; reduce UV-induced photo damage and signs of aging; and nourish and protect skin against environmental damage moisture, regulate oil production and maintain elasticity.
Star Omega: Avocado Oil is a particularly good oil for dry skin as it has extraordinary skin penetration abilities and can nourish different skin layers. It is a very rich, highly moisturizing emollient oil that makes the skin smooth and nourished.

Pour 1/2 teaspoon (roughly a dime-sized amount) of powder into the palm of your hand. Add a few drops of water and mix until you achieve a creamy consistency.
